attributes.action: nominate Martin Lewis for an MBE for his services to the British Consumer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Martin Lewis has championed the cause of the British Consumer for many years, and through educating and communicating, he has enlightened millions of people to improve and benefit financially.  In 2003 Martin created MoneySavingExpert.com which now attracts over 7 million hits per month.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
